name: A Lesson In Frustration
description:
A submission for the GMTKJam 2020, of the theme "Out of Control".

A Lesson in Frustration takes control of the difficulty slider, dynamically!

Touch the goal orb to complete the level while avoiding pit falls and the crushing wall of despair.

Controls:

  • A and D or LEFT and RIGHT to move.
  • X or SHIFT to run.
  • Z or SPACE to jump.

Credits:

  • Zach Reiter - Lead Programmer, Sprite Artist.
  • Nathan Lockwood - Programmer, Level Designer, Sprite Artist.
  • Ben Wilcox - Dropper of sick beats.
